post.text: Great morning in San Antonio, Texas - GREAT afternoon in Dallas, Texas. Departing now for Florida! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Tori
comment.text: I feel Hillary already has this election sewn up. She's a LIAR and a cheater. And I'd bet my life she's got it rigged!!!

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: It's rigged Tori but if God has chosen Trump to make America great again,,,their lies and cheating won't stop Trump from winning

replies.author: Miranda
replies.text: I agree Robert !!! God sees what the American people want & need...I believe he will allow Trump to Triumph over the crooked leaders we have now!!! Tori ....let's all pray as one nation under God that we will get a better leader for our Country!!! We need one so bad!!!

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: Miranda ,,,Amen ,we all need to pray harder than we ever have,,how sad will it be if America falls,,the whole world will be affected,,
